content: You have entered a circular map. In the following questions, I will tell you what items are on the map, as well as your position and movements. You need to tell me the item you find after your movements. Please provide only the name of the item. Note that your answer should include only the name of the item and no other words.(Notice that for the same ring map, if the number of steps in the route is doubled, the distance from the starting point to the endpoint should also be doubled.)

You have been given a circular path consisting of 20 connected dots. At the start, you are positioned on the dot that is located at the top of the path, where you find an ox. Moving in a clockwise direction from the ox, the elements on the path are an Otterhound, a wallaby, a tow truck, a bikini, a go-kart, a pretzel, a Chihuahua, a snoek, a lionfish, a peacock, a Schipperke, a sidewinder, a plunger, a coho salmon, a taxicab, a brain coral, a mailbox, a dome, and a Pyrenean Mountain Dog. Starting from the snoek, you move around the ring by 13 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 3 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 3 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 12 steps in a counter-clockwise direction. What will you find?

Starting from the snoek, you move around the ring by 26 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 6 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 6 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 24 steps in a counter-clockwise direction. What will you find?
